sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT A.PROD_OFFER_ID, A.PROD_OFFER_NAME PACKAGENAME, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(B.PRODUCT_NAME) FROM PRODUCT B, OFFER_PROD_REL C WHERE C.PROD_OFFER_ID = A.PROD_OFFER_ID AND B.PRODUCT_ID = C.PRODUCT_ID ) PRODUCTS, to_char(A.STATUS_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')STATUS_DATE, if(STATUS_CD='1000', 'In Use',if(STATUS_CD='1000','In Use','Invalid'))STATUS_CD , (SELECT IF(D.ORG_TYPE_CODE = 1,'Enterprise', IF(D.ORG_TYPE_CODE = 2,'Enterprise',IF(D.ORG_TYPE_CODE = 0,'Internal Organization','Unknown'))) FROM ORG D WHERE D.ORG_ID = A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID) ORG_TYPE FROM PROD_OFFER A WHERE a.status_cd != '1300'
AND A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID IN( SELECT M.ORG_ID FROM ORG M WHERE M.ORG_TYPE_CODE IN
#ORG_TYPE_CODE[]#
)
AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE IN (10,12,13,14)
AND a.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = #ORG_ID#
AND A.PROD_OFFER_NAME like concat('%',#PROD_OFFER_NAME#,'%')
AND A.PROD_OFFER_ID IN
#PROD_OFFER_ID[]#
Limit #pro_mysql#,#page_record#

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM( SELECT DISTINCT A.PROD_OFFER_ID FROM PROD_OFFER A WHERE A.STATUS_CD != '1300'
AND a.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = #ORG_ID#
AND A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID IN( SELECT M.ORG_ID FROM ORG M WHERE M.ORG_TYPE_CODE IN
#ORG_TYPE_CODE[]#
)
AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE IN (10,12,13,14)
AND A.PROD_OFFER_NAME like concat('%',#PROD_OFFER_NAME#,'%')
AND A.PROD_OFFER_ID IN
#PROD_OFFER_ID[]#
) T

SELECT SERVICE_ID, CONTRACT_VERSION_ID, SERVICE_CN_NAME, SERVICE_EN_NAME, SERVICE_CODE, SERVICE_TYPE, SERVICE_VERSION, to_char(CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')CREATE_DATE, STATE, to_char(LASTEST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')LASTEST_DATE, SERVICE_DESC, IS_PUBLISHED, SERVICE_PRIORITY, SERVICE_TIMEOUT, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW, AUDIT_FLOW_ID FROM SERVICE A WHERE A.STATE = 'A' Limit #pro_mysql#,#page_record#
SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM SERVICE A WHERE A.STATE = 'A'
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT nextval('SEQ_PROD_OFFER') FROM DUAL
insert into PROD_OFFER (STATUS_DATE,CREATE_DT,VERSION
PROD_OFFER_ID OFFER_TYPE PROD_OFFER_NAME INNER_OFFER_NAME
PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER STATUS_CD EFF_DATE EXP_DATE OFFER_NBR OFFER_PROVIDER_ID BRAND_ID SERV_BRAND_ID TEMPLET_ID DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD PROD_OFFER_DESC EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID EXP_PROC_METHOD VALUE_ADDED_FLAG MANAGE_GRADE PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION COMMON_REGION_ID MANAGE_GRADE2
SIMPLE_SPELL
INNER_OFFER_NBR PROD_OFFER_TRAIT COOPERATION_TYPE LOGO_FILE_ID
) values (utc_timestamp(),utc_timestamp(),utc_timestamp()
#prodOfferId# #offerType# #prodOfferName# #innerOfferName#
#prodOfferPublisher# #statusCd# #effDate# #expDate# #offerNbr# #offerProviderId# #brandId# #servBrandId# #templetId# #defaultTimePeriod# #prodOfferDesc# #extProdOfferId# #expProcMethod# #valueAddedFlag# #manageGrade# #prodOfferInitialamount# #expireHandleCondition# #commonRegionId# #manageGrade2#
#simpleSpell#
#innerOfferNbr# #prodOfferTrait# #cooperationType# #logoFileId#
)

SELECT nextval('SEQ_SERVICE_PRODUCT_REAL');
INSERT INTO SERVICE_PRODUCT_REAL ( SERVICE_PRODUCT_REAL_ID, PRODUCT_ID, SERVICE_ID ) VALUES( #serviceProRelId#, #PRODUCT_ID#, #SERVICEID# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.SERVICE_ID SERVICEID,B.SERVICE_CN_NAME CNNAME,D.DIR_NAME DIRNAME,B.SERVICE_DESC SERVICEDESC,B.SERVICE_VERSION SERVICEVERSION FROM service B,dir_ser_list C,directory D WHERE B.SERVICE_ID=C.SERVICE_ID AND C.DIR_ID=D.DIR_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID IN
#service[]#

SELECT B.SERVICE_ID SERVICEID,B.SERVICE_CN_NAME CNNAME,B.SERVICE_DESC SERVICEDESC,B.SERVICE_VERSION SERVICEVERSION FROM service B WHERE B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND B.SERVICE_ID IN
#service[]#
SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM SERVICE_PRODUCT_REAL WHERE SERVICE_ID = #SERVICEID#

SELECT DISTINCT FF.PROD_OFFER_ID , (SELECT H.NAME FROM ORG H WHERE H.ORG_ID = FF.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID) ORG_NAME, FF.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID ORG_ID FROM SERVICE D, DIR_SER_LIST A, SERVICE_PRODUCT_REAL B, PRODUCT C, OFFER_PROD_REL DD, PROD_OFFER FF WHERE A.SERVICE_ID = B.SERVICE_ID AND D.SERVICE_ID = A.SERVICE_ID AND B.PRODUCT_ID = C.PRODUCT_ID AND A.STATE = 'A' AND C.STATUS_CD != '1300' AND C.PRODUCT_ID = DD.PRODUCT_ID AND DD.PROD_OFFER_ID = FF.PROD_OFFER_ID AND FF.STATUS_CD = '1000'
AND D.STATE = #STATE#
AND D.SERVICE_ID IN
#API_IDS[]#

SELECT A.PRICING_INFO_ID PRICINGINFOID, A.PRICING_NAME PRICINGNAME, A.PRICING_TYPE PRICINGTYPE, A.PRICING_DESC PRICINGDESC, A.PRICE_SIGN PRICESIGN, A.PRICE_CHA PRICECHA, A.EFF_DATE EFFDATE, A.EXP_DATE EXPDATE, A.BILLING_PRIORITY BILLINGPRIORITY, A.LICENSE_NBR LICENSENBR, A.APPLIC_TYPE APPLICTYPE, A.CYCLE_TYPE CYCLETYPE, A.CREATE_DATE CREATEDATE, A.STATUS_DATE STATUSDATE, A.STATUS_CD STATUSCD, B.PRICING_TARGET_ID PRICINGTARGETID FROM PRICING_PLAN A,PROD_OFFER_PRICING B WHERE A.STATUS_CD!='11' AND B.PROD_OFFER_ID = #prodOfferId# AND A.PRICING_INFO_ID = B.PRICING_INFO_ID ORDER BY A.BILLING_PRIORITY DESC
sqlMap.update:
update pricing_plan
pricing_classify=#pricingClassify# pricing_type=#pricingType# pricing_desc=#pricingDesc# beyond_desc=#beyondDesc# price_sign=#priceSign# price_cha=#priceCha# eff_date=#effDate# exp_date=#expDate# is_main=#isMain# license_nbr=#licenseNbr# applic_type=#applicType# billing_priority=#billingPriority# cycle_type=#cycletype# status_cd=#statusCd# cycle_unit=#cycleUnit# PRICING_NAME=#pricingName#
where pricing_info_id = #pricingInfoId#
sqlMap.select:
select prod_offer_pricing_id prodOfferPricingId, PROD_OFFER_ID prodOfferId, PRICING_INFO_ID pricingInfoId, PRICING_TARGET_ID pricingTargetId, CREATE_DATE createDate, STATUS_CD statusCd, STATUS_DATE statusDate, PRICING_TYPE pricingType from prod_offer_pricing where STATUS_CD!='11'
PROD_OFFER_PRICING_ID=#prodOfferPricingId# PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# PRICING_INFO_ID=#pricingInfoId# PRICING_TARGET_ID=#pricingTargetId#
order by PRICING_TARGET_ID asc
sqlMap.update:
update prod_offer_pricing set STATUS_DATE = utc_timestamp()
STATUS_CD=#statusCd# PRICING_TYPE=#pricingType#
where PROD_OFFER_PRICING_ID=#prodOfferPricingId#

update pricing_target set STATUS_DATE = utc_timestamp()
STATUS_CD=#statusCd# PRICING_TARGET_NAME=#pricingTargetName# PRICING_TARGET_TYPE=#pricingTargetType#
where PRICING_TARGET_ID=#pricingTargetId#
sqlMap.select:
select offer_prod_rel_pricing_id offerProdRelPricingId, offer_prod_rela_id offerProdRelaId, pricing_target_id pricingInfoId, create_date createDate, status_cd statusCd, status_date statusDate from offer_prod_rel_pricing where status_cd!='11'
offer_prod_rel_pricing_id=#offerProdRelPricingId# offer_prod_rela_id=#offerProdRelaId# pricing_target_id=#pricingInfoId#
order by offer_prod_rel_pricing_id asc
sqlMap.update:
update offer_prod_rel_pricing set STATUS_DATE = utc_timestamp()
STATUS_CD=#statusCd#
where offer_prod_rel_pricing_id=#offerProdRelPricingId#
UPDATE PROD_OFFER S SET S.STATUS_CD = #statusCd# WHERE S.PROD_OFFER_ID = #prodOfferId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT tenant_id tenantId, name name, code code, logo logo, country country, province province, language language, zip_code zipCode, contract_num contractNum, currency currency, status status, time_zone timeZone, theme theme, create_dt createDt, start_dt startDt, end_dt endDt FROM tenant
tenant_id=#tenantId# code=#code#
